description: Artifact pipeline definition that reads events from BQ and ingests workflow logs to GCS.
name: artifact_integration

parameters.name: batch-size
parameters.helpText: Number of items to process in this execution
parameters.label: Batch Size

parameters.name: events-project-id
parameters.helpText: Project ID of the events table
parameters.label: Events Table Project ID

parameters.name: events-table
parameters.helpText: Dataset + name of the events table. Must be in the format, i.e. gma.events_table
parameters.label: Events Table Name

parameters.name: leech-project-id
parameters.helpText: Project ID of the leech status table
parameters.label: Lecch Status Table Project ID

parameters.name: leech-table
parameters.helpText: Dataset + name of the leech table. Must be in the format, ie. gma.leech_status
parameters.label: Leech Status Table Name

parameters.name: logs-bucket-name
parameters.helpText: Name of the Cloud Storage bucket to store GitHub logs
parameters.label: Logs Bucket Name

parameters.name: github-private-key-secret
parameters.helpText: Fully qualified path to a secret containing the GitHub app's private key, i.e. projects/<project_id>/secrets/<name>/versions/<version>
parameters.label: GitHub Private Key Secret
